scripts.test:load: tsc src/load-test.ts --outDir dist && webpack && k6 run dist/load-test.js

scripts.test:post: tsc src/post-base-test.ts --outDir dist && webpack && k6 run dist/post-base-test.js
scripts.test:smoke: tsc src/smoke-test.ts --outDir dist && webpack && k6 run dist/smoke-test.js
